ColourWords.Title: Pronoun one/ones
ColourWords.Instruction: Click on five words you can change to one or ones.

ContentColourWords.Sentence: When I was young I studied at three different schools. The first schoolwas old and very small. The second schoolwas modern and large, but the teachers weren't very nice. The thirdschoolwas in a horrible building, but I was very happy there because I liked the other students. Thestudentsin my class were really friendly, and the studentsin the English lessons were very nice.
